## Gate Philosophy

> **Principle:** Evidence over optimism.
>
> **Decision Rule:** GO requires ALL mandatory criteria MET. Any VETO = NO-GO.
>
> **Default Stance:** NO-GO until proven otherwise.

---

```
VETO CONDITIONS:       [CLEAR] 0 TRIGGERED

PRELIMINARY VERDICT:   ON_TRACK for GO on Day 7
```

## Mandatory Criteria (ALL must be MET)

| ID | Criterion | Threshold | Day 3 Status | Evidence |
|----|-----------|-----------|--------------|----------|
| M1 | System Stability | 100% uptime (7 days) | ON_TRACK | 162 CNRP cycles, 0 timeouts |
| M2 | Abort Competence | 0 ensemble signals | **MET** | 0 signals, 50 gate interventions |
| M3 | Overconfidence Suppression | Gate activity >0/day | **MET** | 50 signals capped |
| M4 | Learning Continuity | >800 forecasts/day avg | ON_TRACK | 1,308 Day 3, avg 1,133 |
| M5 | Governance Integrity | 0 violations | **MET** | 0 unauthorized migrations |
| M6 | Standing Constraints | All verified | **MET** | 5/5 constraints verified |

|----------|----|----|----|----|----|----|----------|
| All MET | OK | OK | OK | OK | OK | OK | **GO** |
| Any NOT_MET | ? | ? | ? | ? | ? | ? | **NO-GO** |

## Recommended Criteria (Should be MET)

| ID | Criterion | Threshold | Day 3 Status | Gap if NOT_MET |
|----|-----------|-----------|--------------|----------------|
| R1 | Brier Improvement | No degradation >0.05 | PENDING | Document trend |
| R2 | Outcome Pair Accumulation | >0 pairs/day avg | **CONCERN** | Audit horizons |
| R3 | IOS-003-B Value Signal | variance >0 | PENDING | Null hypothesis valid |
| R4 | Monotonicity Restoration | Non-decreasing curve | NOT_DETERMINABLE | Extend observation |

### Recommended Criteria Decision Table

| R Criteria Status | Impact |
|-------------------|--------|
| All MET | Clean GO |
| 1-2 NOT_MET | GO with documented gaps |
| 3+ NOT_MET | Review required, possible extension |

## Veto Conditions (ANY triggers NO-GO)

| ID | Condition | Trigger | Day 3 Status |
|----|-----------|---------|--------------|
| V1 | Governance Violation | Unauthorized write to fhq_governance | **CLEAR** |
| V2 | Exposure Introduced | Any trading activity | **CLEAR** |
| V3 | System Failure | Core system offline >24h | **CLEAR** |
| V4 | Data Integrity Breach | Hash mismatch in evidence | **CLEAR** |
| V5 | Regret Rate Extreme | >35% regret rate | **CLEAR** (24.6%) |

### Veto Decision Table

| Veto Triggered? | Decision | Action |
|-----------------|----------|--------|
| No | Continue evaluation | - |
| Yes | **AUTOMATIC NO-GO** | Full audit required |

## Decision Matrix

```
                    VETO CONDITIONS
                    CLEAR          TRIGGERED
                 +-----------+-------------+
    ALL MET      |    GO     |   NO-GO     |
    MANDATORY    |  (CEO     |  (Audit     |
    CRITERIA     |  approval)|  required)  |
                 +-----------+-------------+
    ANY NOT MET  |  NO-GO    |   NO-GO     |
                 | (Extend   |  (Audit +   |
                 |  or fix)  |   extend)   |
                 +-----------+-------------+
```

---

## Evaluation Logic

### GO Decision
**Requirements:**
1. ALL mandatory criteria (M1-M6) = MET
2. ALL veto conditions (V1-V5) = CLEAR
3. CEO approval obtained

**Action:** Transition to M2_CALIBRATION phase
**Deliverable:** M1_EXIT_PACKAGE with full evidence bundle

---

### Conditional GO Decision
**Requirements:**
1. ALL mandatory criteria (M1-M6) = MET
2. ALL veto conditions (V1-V5) = CLEAR
3. 1-2 recommended criteria NOT_MET with documented gaps

**Action:** Transition with documented gaps
**Deliverable:** M1_EXIT_PACKAGE + Gap remediation plan

---

### NO-GO Decision
**Triggers:**
- ANY mandatory criterion NOT_MET
- ANY veto condition TRIGGERED

**Action:** Extend M1 by 3 days OR escalate to CEO
**Deliverable:** Gap analysis + remediation timeline

---

### Extension Decision
**Triggers:**
- Insufficient data for evaluation (sample size <100)
- PENDING status on >2 mandatory criteria

**Action:** Automatic 3-day extension
**Deliverable:** Extension justification document

---

## Day 7 Deliverables

| ID | Deliverable | Description | Format |
|----|-------------|-------------|--------|
| D1 | Criteria Evaluation Table | Final status of all criteria | JSON + MD |
| D2 | Evidence Bundle | All queries with results and hashes | JSON |
| D3 | Gap Analysis | NOT_MET criteria with remediation | MD |
| D4 | CEO Decision Package | 1-page summary for approval | MD |

## Current Risk Assessment

| Risk | Probability | Impact | Mitigation |
|------|-------------|--------|------------|
| Outcome pairs remain 0 | Medium | Low | Horizon audit scheduled |
| Brier sample too small | High | Low | Extension acceptable |
| System instability | Low | High | Continuous monitoring |
| Governance violation | Very Low | Critical | Automated detection |

**Key Risk:** Outcome pair accumulation (R2) - requires monitoring but NOT blocking.
